titles.title: HP820 Lift up your hearts to things above

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lift up your hearts to things above,
Ye followers of the Lamb,
And join with us to praise his love
And glorify his name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To Jesu's name give thanks and sing,
Whose mercies never end:
Rejoice! Rejoice! The Lord is King;
The King is now our friend!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Our life is hid with Christ in God;
Our Life shall soon appear,
And shed his glory all abroad
In all his members here.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Our souls are in his mighty hand,
And he shall keep them still;
And you and I shall surely stand
With him on Zion's hill.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Him face to face we there shall see,
Illustrious we shall shine:
O what a glorious company,
When saints and angels join!
